activities:
Austinshire Partners provides monetization solutions to companies in the UK/EU that operate in the online marketing, lead generation, finance and insurance industries. The target client make up may expand as we grow. 

Austinshire Partners creates websites that compliment our clients products and market newsletters and offers to their consumers, via email and mobile marketing. 

We will receive email addresses, first name, last name, sign up domain, Sign Up IP for every consumer. We may also receive Gender, Postal Address, Income, Job/Employment status.

We employ websites to accomplish our marketing initiatives. For example: www.employermatch.co.uk (http://employermatch.co.uk/privacy-policy/). 

We will be sending relevant news, content, and joblistings and/or coupons, to our client's consumers.
personaldata: email address, first name, last name, postal address, gender, employment status, phone number, sign up source domain (website), sign up IP address. All data will be processed via API.
recoursemech:
There are various methods for a consumer to contact Austinshire Partners: email, phone call, and/or by letter. We will address any issue immediately and work with the consumer on the appropriate remedy. 

We will Cooperate and comply with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) to investigate unresolved complaints.

We also have registered with the UK Information Commissioners Office (Registration number: ZA036195).
